name: Rect
description:
The screen sharing region.
Deprecated:
  This class is deprecated. Please use the updateScreenCaptureRegion method to update the shared area.

parameters.top: The coordinate of the top side of the shared area on the vertical axis.

parameters.left: The coordinate of the left side of the shared area on the horizontal axis.

parameters.bottom: The coordinate of the bottom side of the shared area on the vertical axis.

parameters.right: The coordinate of the right side of the shared area on the horizontal axis.
